message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $11,000. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11,000 is still outside my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10,000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you, and it's the highest I'm willing to go.
